snippet.title: Monuments To Guilt - A short exhibition exploring exclusionary design!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://louisthings.itch.io/monuments-to-guilt?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Take a first-person wander through Monuments to Guilt, a short exhibition exploring exclusionary design. Acquaint yourself with the core principles of this harmful practice, re-evaluate the objects you see every day and let guilt sit with you, for just a little while.

➡️ More from Louis https://louisthings.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More museum games https://itch.io/games/tag-museum?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
